metadata.title: USN-3839-1 -- WavPack vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that WavPack incorrectly handled certain WAV files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2018-19840, CVE-2018-19841)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3839-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libwavpack1 - 5.1.0-2ubuntu1.2 libwavpack-dev - 5.1.0-2ubuntu1.2 wavpack - 5.1.0-2ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
